headline: Lockheed's Unit Wins a $131M Contract to Aid Integrated Combat System
summary: LMT's Rotary and Mission Systems unit wins a $131M Navy contract to support engineering and software integration for its Integrated Combat System.

headline: Why the Narrative Around RTX Is Changing After Recent Analyst Upgrades and Emerging Risks
summary: RTX stock’s Fair Value Estimate has inched up from $164.58 to $166.56, reflecting a measured rise in analyst optimism. This new assessment comes as recent research reveals a dynamic mix of bullish momentum and persistent sector uncertainties. Stay tuned to discover how investors can keep track of evolving market narratives around RTX. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent analyst commentary reveals a complex balance between renewed optimism and persistent caution in assessments of RTX...

headline: TransDigm Buys Simmonds Precision Products for $765M, Boosts Portfolio
summary: TDG expands its product offering with a $765 million cash buyout of Simmonds Precision Products from RTX.

raw.headline: TransDigm Buys Simmonds Precision Products for $765M, Boosts Portfolio

headline: Forterra, RTX’s Raytheon and Oshkosh Showcase DeepFires™ Autonomous Launcher Prototypes at AUSA 2025
summary: Washington, D.C., Oct. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WASHINGTON, D.C., Oct. 7, 2025 — Forterra, the leader in autonomous mission systems, in collaboration with Raytheon, an RTX business, the world’s largest aerospace and defense company, and Oshkosh Defense, an Oshkosh Corporation company and leading innovator of purpose-built vehicles and equipment, will display two DeepFires™ autonomous launcher prototypes at the 2025 Association of the United States Army's Annual Meeting and Exposition. Togeth

headline: RTX and Anduril complete successful test of advanced solid rocket motor
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, and Anduril have successfully conducted a static fire test of an advanced solid rocket motor under a contract with the Air Force Research Laboratory Munitions Directorate.
